summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5739 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 51, Yesler's 2nd Addition to Seattle, Supplemental, being the alley between 24th Avenue and 25th Avenue, from East Howell Street to East Denny Way; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 75778, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
